PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(76) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... kr. 克朗 kraal 部落 kraft paper 牛皮纸.
居住地称做“克拉尔”(Kraal)，四周建有茅屋并连成一个圆圈,分给各个妻子居住,唯独丈夫没有固定房屋，轮流住在各个妻子的茅屋里。

PerfectNetExp.exp: 妻室都有自己的克拉尔
PerfectNetExp.abs: 大妻室、右妻室(我母亲)、左妻室和伊夸狄(也叫家务助理)四个妻室都有自己的克拉尔(Kraal)。一个克拉尔就是一处家园和田产,通常由.
据“中央社”报道，阿育他耶省一个叫做卡拉尔的象园(Kraal)，工人正为5岁的母象帕莱(Plai Panlan)漆上水彩，它温驯地坐在地上，耳 …

list.abs: 马奶酒 koumiss牛栏 cattle kraal牛皮纸 kraft paper

means.word_mean: 1. a village of huts for native Africans in southern Africa; usually surrounded by a stockade
2. a pen for livestock in southern Africa

auth_sentence.content: The kraal allows visitors to stay and help look after the elephants - but watch out.

auth_sentence.content: The camp was set up like a kraal, with thirty-odd trucks parked in tight groups to form a large, fanlike defensive circle.
